title: Neuroscience PhD
description_1: PhD student with [Dr. Greg Jefferis](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Gregory_Jefferis)
description_2: [Thesis](https://drive.google.com/file/d/1qiiAcquT948EcSC0SJYW85j8C-amOKkT/view): The lateral horn, a brain region in the fly, primes innate olfactory behaviours by combining patterns of second-order olfactory projection neuron activity. In my work, I developed tools and analyses, and reconstructed neural networks from electron microscopy data, in order to better understand this brain region and how memory systems interact with it
